Package FBLAQuiz

Class DraggableLine

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
FBLAQuiz.DraggableLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class DraggableLine
extends javax.swing.JComponent

Draggable Line Class

The DraggableLine class creates a component which is a line with one end fixed, and the other being draggable by the mouse.
Author:
Varun Unnithan
See Also:
Serialized Form
